description: The 'conversation_history' dataset captures detailed records of interactions related to loan applications, providing insights into customer queries, responses, and decision-making processes. This dataset is particularly useful for analyzing customer service interactions, understanding common customer concerns, and improving automated response systems. It includes unique identifiers for each conversation and message, names of the conversations, and the large language model (LLM) used. The dataset also records user interactions, questions asked, and the corresponding answers provided, along with metadata such as timestamps and feedback. Additionally, it contains information about the knowledge bank and sources referenced during the conversation, which can be crucial for auditing and improving the knowledge base. This dataset is valuable for financial institutions aiming to enhance customer service, streamline loan approval processes, and develop AI-driven customer interaction models. It can also be used for training machine learning models to predict customer behavior and improve decision-making in loan approvals.
shortDesc: Dataset of conversation history for loan application discussions.

columns.name: conversation_id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for each conversation, ensuring traceability.

columns.name: conversation_name
columns.comment: Descriptive name of the conversation, indicating topic.

columns.name: knowledge_bank_id
columns.comment: Identifier for the knowledge bank used in conversation.

columns.name: knowledge_bank_name
columns.comment: Name of the knowledge bank referenced in conversation.

columns.name: llm_name
columns.comment: Name of the large language model used in conversation.

columns.name: user
columns.comment: Identifier for the user participating in the conversation.

columns.name: message_id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for each message within a conversation.

columns.name: question
columns.comment: Customer's question or query during the conversation.

columns.name: filters
columns.comment: JSON object containing filter criteria applied.

columns.name: file_path
columns.comment: Path to files referenced during the conversation.

columns.name: answer
columns.comment: Response provided to the customer's question.

columns.name: sources
columns.comment: JSON object detailing sources referenced in conversation.

columns.name: feedback_value
columns.comment: Value indicating feedback on the conversation.

columns.name: feedback_choice
columns.comment: Choice indicating type of feedback given.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.comment: Timestamp of when the conversation occurred.

columns.name: state
columns.comment: Current state or status of the conversation.

columns.name: llm_context
columns.comment: JSON object with context for the LLM used.

columns.name: generated_media
columns.comment: JSON object with media generated during conversation.
